name: GAS STATION SIMULATOR REMAKE
description:
Gas Station Simulator is a simulation game to manage a gas station. Besides managing gas stations, players can also unlock features such as mini markets, ATMs, toilets, and so on.

you can explore the vast city using your private car and you can also sleep at night.

fill your home with hundreds of various furniture and make your home a comfortable resting place..

You can also interact with npc to buy things or

completing quests.
